title: Denise Richards smooches husband Aaron Phypers before casual dinner date at Giorgio Baldi
text:
Denise Richards and husband Aaron Phypers have been together since 2017.

But the two still looked smitten when they stepped out Tuesday.

The latest Real Housewife Of Beverly Hills addition, 48, and love shared a sweet kiss before a casual dinner date at Giorgio Baldi in Santa Monica.

Just the two of us: Denise Richards and husband Aaron Phypers enjoyed a low-key dinner date in Santa Monica on Tuesday night

Denise was dressed down in a white tee shirt and jeans, all topped off with a dark cardigan.

She kept a makeup minimal face and wore her hair down loosely.

Meanwhile actor Aaron looked relaxed in jeans and a tee-shirt that helped showcase is brawny arms.

PDA: The pair kissed before heading into the restaurant, Giorgio Baldi

Ever the gentleman, he carried his wife's camouflage purse for her.

Before heading into the establishment, they kissed, proving romance was very much alive for the pair.

Denise revealed her partner was adopting her youngest child in an interview with The Talk in May.

Family news: Denise revealed her partner was adopting her youngest child in an interview with The Talk in May. The couple are seen in February above

'Aaron is an amazing man, a wonderful stepdad,' she told the host. 'He's an amazing dad to Eloise who he's in the process of adopting.'

The actress/reality star has three children, two of whom are from her relationship to Charlie Sheen.

Denise and Aaron were first sighted together in 2017 and were married in Malibu about one year ago.
description: The latest Real Housewife Of Beverly Hills addition and love shared a sweet kiss before a casual dinner date at Giorgio Baldi in Santa Monica. Both of the actors were dressed down for the outing.
